pages.text: Cherries can be found on Cherry Trees.$(br2)Keep an eye out for red spotted Leaves. You'll need a shear to harvest them properly.
White Grapes can either being harvested from White Grape Bushes or White Grapevines.$(br2)You dont need any tools for harvesting Grapes.
Red Grapes can either being harvested from Red Grape Bushes or White Grapevines.$(br2)You dont need any tools for harvesting Grapes.
Also Apples can be used to craft Wine and Cider.$(br2)Apples can rarely be found by breaking Oak Leaves.
